text:
<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: single_quotes
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{'name': 'John'}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"name": "John"}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_properties
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{"id": 1 "title": "Test" "active": true}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"id": 1, "title": "Test", "active": true}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_properties
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{"id": 1 "title": "Test" "active": true}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"id": 1, "title": "Test", "active": true}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_array
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
[true false null]
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
[true, false, null]
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: multiple_errors
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{name: "John" age: 30 "city": "NYC",}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"name": "John", "age": 30, "city": "NYC"}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: unquoted_keys
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{key1: "val1", key2: "val2"}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"key1": "val1", "key2": "val2"}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_array
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
["apple" "banana" "orange"]
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
["apple", "banana", "orange"]
<|end|>
